title: Vekkia Sonic Rechargeable Kids Electric Toothbrush, 3 Modes with Memory, Fun & Easy Cleaning, 24000 Strokes, IPX7 Waterproof, 2-Min Timer for Age 5+, 4 Soft Bristles(Pink)
features: EXCITED AND FUN BRUSHING TEETH: Cute animal theme design, Let your children fall in love with brush their teeth. Unique small brush head with 3D curved soft bristles, comfortable and efficient, perfect for children's gums and small mouth.

FOR MULTIPLE AGE KIDS: This power toothbrush has 3 modes (clean 7-12, soft 5-6, massage 12+) with memory function, one on/off mode button, it does not need to be held down. Comfortable handle size designed for little hands, lightweight only 2.45oz, easy grip.

EFFICIENT AND SAFE BRUSHING: Speed - Up to 24000 brush movement/min, remove up to 7x more plaque than manual toothbrush, better child's yearly check-ups guarantee. Ipx7 waterproof, can be rinsed in water.

EXTRA LONG BURNING LIFE: This rechargeable kids electric toothbrush requires only 3-4 hours of charging and works for up to 60 days. It's easy to use at home and while traveling to stick to daily brushing.
AUTOMATIC TIMER: This electronic toothbrush has a built-in 2-minute smart timer that encourages your child to brush for longer periods of time, develops good brushing habits and reduces tooth decay.

It is rechargeable and you can find the Type-c charging cable in the package! I have a problem with my toothbrush. How do I contact you? You can massage us through the official website attached to the manual with your order number! Is this toothbrush suitable for my 5 year old son? Of course, our toothbrushes support children aged 5-12 years old, and we recommend that you use the soft mode! I want know if this toothbrush would be a good gift for my daughter? Of course, the packaging of the vekkia toothbrush is very cute and perfect for both girls and boys, and there are many parents who buy it as a gift!
